venue.address_1: Corner of Temple and Chapel Streets
venue.name: Cafe Bottega

item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
CAFFE BOTTEGA

http://bottegagiulian...

Join us for our first happy hour at Caffee Bottega (910 Chapel, corner of Chapel and Temple) home of Manicure/Massage/Maritini (Mondays), Salsa nights (Thursdays), and 24 fabulous flavors of gelato. Fabio is offering us half price appetizers and drink specials.

We will be over by the bar/gelato area. On the other side of the bar will be Manicure/Massage/Martini night for anyone who is interested in a little pampering. For $20 you get a martini and either a manicure or massage. They will also show a movie later in the evening.

DRINK SPECIALS:
$5.00 Martinis
$3.00 Bottles of beer
$2.00 Drafts
Half price appetizers

Contact info
Andrea 203-641-8083
item.name: Monday Happy Hour 4/09 at Caffe Bottega
